alert.note: Alert for Summit (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 23 at 11:57PM EDT until August 24 at 9:18AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Cleveland OH has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Ohio... Cuyahoga River At Old Portage affecting Summit County. For the Cuyahoga River...including Hiram Rapids, Old Portage, Independence...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cuyahoga River At Old Portage. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Floodwaters will begin to affect areas along the Cuyahoga River in Cuyahoga Falls and in Munroe Falls near Kennedy Park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 PM EDT Wednesday the stage was 8.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 10.8 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 10.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 10.8 feet on 06/28/1924. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 930 AM EDT.
